original_text: The officer had chosen a guard to watch Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah. So Daniel spoke to this man.
korean_text: 환관장이 다니엘과 하나냐와 미사엘과 아사랴를 감독하게 한 자에게 다니엘이 말하되

sentences.original_text: The officer had chosen a guard
to watch Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘, 하나냐, 미사엘과 아사랴를 감시하기 위해

sentences.original_text: So Daniel spoke to this man
